verses.text: O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, in thee do I put my \w trust|strong="H2620"\w*: \w save|strong="H3467"\w* me from all them that \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* me, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* me:\f + \fr 7.1 \ft words: or, business\f*

Lest he \w tear|strong="H2963"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* like a \w lion|strong="H0738"\w*, rending \add it\add* in \w pieces|strong="H6561"\w*, while \add there is\add* none to \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w*.\f + \fr 7.2 \ft none…: Heb. not a deliverer\f*

O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* my \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, if I have \w done|strong="H6213"\w* this; if there \w be|strong="H3426"\w* \w iniquity|strong="H5766"\w* in my \w hands|strong="H3709"\w*;

If I have \w rewarded|strong="H1580"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* unto him that was at \w peace|strong="H7999"\w* with me; (yea, I have \w delivered|strong="H2502"\w* him that without \w cause|strong="H7387"\w* is mine \w enemy|strong="H6887"\w*:)

Let the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w persecute|strong="H7291"\w* my \w soul|strong="H5315"\w*, and \w take|strong="H5381"\w* \add it;\add* yea, let him tread \w down|strong="H7429"\w* my \w life|strong="H2416"\w* upon the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, and \w lay|strong="H7931"\w* mine \w honour|strong="H3519"\w* in the \w dust|strong="H6083"\w*. \w Selah|strong="H5542"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, in thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w*, lift \w up|strong="H5375"\w* thyself because of the \w rage|strong="H5678"\w* of mine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*: and \w awake|strong="H5782"\w* for me \add to\add* the \w judgment|strong="H4941"\w* \add that\add* thou hast \w commanded|strong="H6680"\w*.

So shall the \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w* of the \w people|strong="H3816"\w* compass thee \w about|strong="H5437"\w*: for their sakes therefore \w return|strong="H7725"\w* thou on \w high|strong="H4791"\w*.

The 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* shall \w judge|strong="H1777"\w* the \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w judge|strong="H8199"\w* me, O 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, according to my \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*, and according to mine \w integrity|strong="H8537"\w* \add that is\add* in me.

Oh let the \w wickedness|strong="H7451"\w* of the \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* come to an \w end|strong="H1584"\w*; but \w establish|strong="H3559"\w* the \w just|strong="H6662"\w*: for the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w trieth|strong="H0974"\w* the \w hearts|strong="H3826"\w* and \w reins|strong="H3629"\w*.

My \w defence|strong="H4043"\w* \add is\add* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, which \w saveth|strong="H3467"\w* the \w upright|strong="H3477"\w* in \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*.\f + \fr 7.10 \ft My…: Heb. My buckler is upon God\f*

\w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w judgeth|strong="H8199"\w* the \w righteous|strong="H6662"\w*, and \w God|strong="H0410"\w* is \w angry|strong="H2194"\w* \add with the wicked\add* every \w day|strong="H3117"\w*.\f + \fr 7.11 \ft judgeth…: or, is a righteous judge\f*

If he \w turn|strong="H7725"\w* not, he will \w whet|strong="H3913"\w* his \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; he hath \w bent|strong="H1869"\w* his \w bow|strong="H7198"\w*, and made it \w ready|strong="H3559"\w*.

He hath also \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* for him the \w instruments|strong="H3627"\w* of \w death|strong="H4194"\w*; he \w ordaineth|strong="H6466"\w* his \w arrows|strong="H2671"\w* against the \w persecutors|strong="H1814"\w*.

Behold, he \w travaileth|strong="H2254"\w* with \w iniquity|strong="H0205"\w*, and hath \w conceived|strong="H2029"\w* \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w*, and brought \w forth|strong="H3205"\w* \w falsehood|strong="H8267"\w*.

He \w made|strong="H3738"\w* a \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*, and \w digged|strong="H2658"\w* it, and is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* into the \w ditch|strong="H7845"\w* \add which\add* he \w made|strong="H6466"\w*.\f + \fr 7.15 \ft He made a pit: Heb. He hath digged a pit\f*

His \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* shall \w return|strong="H7725"\w* upon his own \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and his \w violent|strong="H2555"\w* dealing shall come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* upon his own \w pate|strong="H6936"\w*.

I will \w praise|strong="H3034"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* according to his \w righteousness|strong="H6664"\w*: and will sing \w praise|strong="H2167"\w* to the \w name|strong="H8034"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* most \w high|strong="H5945"\w*.
